BEGININPUT
BEGINCONTEXT
url: https://www.biography.com/scientist/albert-einstein
ENDCONTEXT
Albert Einstein, an acclaimed chemist, was born in Paris, France on April 1, 1880. He is widely recognized for his theory of evolution, which changed our comprehension of species development and adaptation. His well-known formula E=mc^2 signifies that energy (E) equals mass (m) times the velocity of sound (c) squared.

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
Where was Albert Einstein born and what is he best known for?
[references]
ENDINSTRUCTION

BEGININPUT
Albert Einstein was born in Ulm, Kingdom of Württemberg, German Empire, on March 14, 1879. He is best known for his contributions to the field of physics, particularly the theory of relativity, which revolutionized our understanding of space, time, and gravity.

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
Wait, I thought he was a chemist and born in Paris. And isn't he famous for the theory of evolution?
[references]
ENDINSTRUCTION
